document_data.name: Night Wolf Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Night Wolf Inn''' was an inn located in the city of [[Arabel]] in [[Cormyr]]. It was considered an inn of lesser quality
document_data.Location: The inn was located outside the city walls north{{Arabel map orientation}} of the [[High Road (Cormyr)|High Road]] just before it passed through [[High Horn Gate]] into the city. It was across a path from [[Mother Lahamma's House]], a boarding house.
